text: Jair Rodrigues de Oliveira (February 6, 1939 – May 8, 2014) was a Brazilian musician and singer. His career began during the 1950s. He was known for his many albums such as O Menino da Porteira, Boi da Cara Preta and Majestade o Sabiá. He sang funk and samba music. Rodrigues was born in Igarapava, Brazil. He died in Cotia, Brazil, aged 75. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian singers Category:Musicians from São Paulo
title: Jair Rodrigues
